posts.message: any Suggestion for free .net library handling SMS , I've tried http://www.nuget.org/packages/GSMComm/ but I think it's little bit outdated ...bad queuing ...and more then 64 character received in discrete messages
posts.caption: nuget.org
posts.description: GSMComm is package for GSM phones, mainly for performing SMS-related tasks.

دي hands-on exercises للناس اللي بيتعلموا  javascript أو TDD with jasmine 
(لان الفكرة انهم  بيستخدموا  jasmine علشان يشرحوا js )

عبارة عن المكتبة نفسها (jasmine) مع شوية ملفات مليانين errors و انت بتصلحهم و بتشوف ال output من خلال ال browser. في البداية ال quizzes بتبقى سهلة عشان تعرفك على ال architecture بتاعة المكتبة بعد كدة بتبدأ تزيد شوية بشوية.

(ملحوظة: لازم يكون عندك خلفية و لو بسيطة جداً عن js) 

محاولة ناجحة لخرق طريقة التعليم التقليدية.

posts.message:
hello, everyone.
I was wondering if you guys can help me on something.
I'm required to build a website, just the front-end of it, and I am required to write javascript code that would allow the nav bar background color to change when the user clicks a link (that targets an element on the page) or the user scrolls to that element so the background of the bar would be the same as that of the element.
is there a plugin for that? I'm searching but my deadline is approaching.
thanks a lot

posts.message:
حد عنده فكرة ازاي أقدر أصصم ريبورت (كرييستال ريبورت) يشيل داتا بالتنسيق اللي واضح في الصورة دا ؟ 
يعني مثلا انا باسلكت لبيانات الكارنية الواحد 5 قيم/حقول في كل مرة بيتحقق فيها الشرط؛ وارميها ع الريبورت .. 
عاوز اخلي الورقة الواحدة تشيل بيانات 10 كارنيهات .. أنا دورت كتيير على اني ازاي اقدر اقسم ال detail section .. بحيث ان يبقى كل اتنين جمب بعض ؛ بالشكل دا ماعرفتش !!! -_-

To those who are passionate about having his/her own startup especially in mobile and web development, you can apply for this 2 months internship, you will gain dozens of skills in marketing, business planning, communication skills and more.

#internship #summer #ceo #student #web #mobile #android

Sharing is Caring
posts.description:
Summer Internship Opportunity .. 

LocName is a digital company specialized in developing web/mobile applications. We’re now hiring for a summer internship for 2 months starting June. 

We have designed a special simulation program for interns to work & feel like a CEO for 2 months! So you will be doing Business plans, marketing, meeting partners and everything like a CEO!! The opportunity is great for anyone wants to learn all tools needed for his/her future career!

Do you have the passion and strive to be an entrepreneur?!.......it’s your chance. Join our team, and promising start up LocName. 

If you are a university student and active in students activities don’t waste any more time and send us your CV ASAP on info@locname.com
